if_conditional.comments: The parenthesis around the conditional are optional.

if_else_conditional.code:
if true
  expressions
else
  expressions
end

if_elseif_conditional.code:
if true
  expressions
elsif true
  expressions
end

if_elseif_else_conditional.code:
if condition
  expressions
elsif condition
  expressions
else
  expressionss
end

do_while_loop.code:
loop do
  expressions
  break unless conditional
end

do_until_loop.code:
loop do
  expressions
  break if conditional
end

for_loop.code:
for i in (0...5) do |i|
  expressions
end
for_loop.comment: `.each` is preferred. For is not normally used.

foreach_loop.code:
for i in arr do
  puts i
end
foreach_loop.comment: `.each` is preferred. For is not normally used.

each_iteration.code:
[].each do |item|
  expressions
end
# or...
[].each_with_index do |item, index|
  expressions
end

map_iteration.code:
[].map(&:magic!)
# OR...
[].map do |item|
  item.magic!
end
# OR...
[].map { |item| item.magic! }
